channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-47703|2024-08-02T21:16:42.822Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 4.3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 271197.

item.title: CVE-2023-47702|2024-08-02T21:16:42.991Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 4.3 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view modify files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 271196.

item.title: CVE-2023-47707|2024-08-02T21:16:43.585Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 4.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271522.

item.title: CVE-2023-47706|2024-08-02T21:16:43.755Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 4.3 could allow an authenticated user to upload files of a dangerous file type. IBM X-Force ID: 271341.

item.title: CVE-2023-47705|2024-08-02T21:16:43.207Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 4.3 could allow an authenticated user to manipulate username data due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 271228.

item.title: CVE-2023-47704|2024-08-02T21:16:43.589Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 4.3 contains plain text hard-coded credentials or other secrets in source code repository. IBM X-Force ID: 271220.

item.title: CVE-2023-25925|2024-08-02T11:32:12.735Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 247632.

item.title: CVE-2023-25926|2024-08-02T11:39:05.322Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 247599.

item.title: CVE-2023-25921|2024-08-02T11:32:12.756Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 allows the attacker to upload or transfer files of dangerous types that can be automatically processed within the product's environment. IBM X-Force ID: 247620.

item.title: CVE-2023-25922|2024-08-02T11:32:12.764Z -- ibm -- security%20guardium%20key%20lifecycle%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 allows the attacker to upload or transfer files of dangerous types that can be automatically processed within the product's environment. IBM X-Force ID: 247621.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 247632.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium Key Lifecycle Manager 3.0, 3.0.1, 4.0, 4.1, and 4.1.1 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 247599.
